description.value: Hidden darkness whispers to you, teaching you secrets of shadow beyond other spellcasters of your tradition. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Blast], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Siphon], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Umbral Journey], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Replicate], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Army], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Projectile], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shadow Raid] to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
